```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# ----- Read-in data

# --- File name
file_path <- paste0("data/qcaa_stats_sen_subjects_", c(2008:2018), ".xlsx")

# --- Reduce all .xlsx files to one data frame
subj_group <- file_path %>% 
  purrr::map(read_xlsx) %>% 
  purrr::reduce(rbind)

# --- Clean variable names
subj_group <- subj_group %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```
